output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the established criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, there is a CUI mandatar financiar mentioned at the end of the post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions Marcel Ciolacu as a presidential candidate.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram, targeting a large audience (100,001-500,000 people).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly states support for both parliamentary candidates and specifically for Marcel Ciolacu in the presidential elections.
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a campaign message, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication from PSD Gorj, with paid promotion.
The post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly promotes a presidential candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) - It's a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - It contains official party messaging and campaign financing information - It's running after the conclusion of the presidential campaign period

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post clearly constitutes electoral propaganda as it: 1. Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate 2. Is funded and distributed as paid advertising 3. Contains official campaign elements (CUI mandatar) 4. Reaches a wide audience through multiple platforms 5. Has clear electoral objectives
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Gorj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul publicitar, cu ID-ul 888133213528318 pe facebook, promovat ca reclama platita, prezinta un indemn explicit de sustinere a candidatului la functia de presedinte, fiind distribuit dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Mesajul a avut un impact semnificativ, atingand intre 10.000 si 14.999 de persoane, fiind distribuit atat pe Facebook cat si pe Instagram, reprezentand astfel o incalcare clara a prevederilor legale privind perioada de campanie electorala.
